product_name: Tifosi Seek FC Photochromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Playing or working in the sun all day, the Tifosi Seek FC photochromic sunglasses have you covered. The lenses automatically adjust as you move from the sun to the shade. Fototec(TM) lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten when there's less light. Carbon frames with Fototec light-night gray lenses feature the widest light transmission range that Tifosi offers, offering clarity from dawn to dusk. White/black frames feature Fototec smoke gray lenses that excel in bright sun, without distorting colors. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits medium to large faces. Tifosi Seek photochromic sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Playing or working in the sun all day, the Tifosi Seek FC photochromic sunglasses have you covered. The lenses automatically adjust as you move from the sun to the shade.
